description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. You are a Bomb Disposal Expert in training. Hold your nerve while you exercise your memory and rhythm, following the light sequences. Hurry up or the bomb will explode!  Play with up to eight friends (only one pad needed) in a crazy multiplayer mode.  And if you start to think it's easy to defuse a bomb, try the special modes: mirror, clockwise and counterclockwise... and think again!!
